title: International Wildcard All-stars Screening at Hoyts Sylvia Park
body:
Hi guys!

I was wondering if any you know that the collectible cup you get for a Lol Combo for this screening, is it a lol collectible cup or a random movie collectible cup? I really want to know because i want to book some tickets before all the seats go and if the cup is a collectible one i will get buy a combo and if it isnt i will just buy a ticket. I don't want to get the Lol Combo and waste $15 if it doesnt have  a nice Lol collectible. So if someone could get back to me on this , asap would be greatly appreciated!!!

Cheers!

replies.body: Hi, presently this is an OPL LoL cup and we are trying to work with Coke and HOYTS to create an All Stars cup.
Is the cup 100% going to be made?
Thank you! will you guys put an image up of it closer to the Date?  Same with the all star bag?
If it's cool and I like it, I will buy the LoL Combo add on :D <3
